subject: Guest post pitch: nearly 10 years of real copy trading results
body:
Hi,

I'm Tom from Social Trading Vlog. I've been copy trading on eToro since 2016 — nearly 10 years — documenting everything across 335 YouTube videos and my website socialtradingvlog.com.

I'd love to write a guest post for Monevator on the topic:

"Copy Trading vs Index Funds: What Nearly 10 Years of Real-Money Data Taught Me"

Unlike most copy trading content, my perspective comes from nearly a decade of documented, real results — not theory or affiliate-driven reviews. I can share:

- Actual annualised returns compared to a simple index fund benchmark
- The real costs (spreads, overnight fees, currency conversion) that most articles ignore
- Lessons from multiple major drawdowns (COVID crash, 2022 bear market, and more)
- Whether I'd recommend it as part of a diversified portfolio

The tone would match Monevator's evidence-based, no-hype style. I'm a UK expat living in Malta, so I can also cover the EU regulatory angle.

Happy to share an outline or draft first. Thanks for considering!

Best,
Tom
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
